title: Supplier information for
description: Check the supplier information and edit details for the primary contact for this order.
insetAdvice: Once saved, you'll not be able to change the supplier for this order

errorMessages.FirstNameTooLong: First name must be 100 characters or fewer
errorMessages.LastNameTooLong: Last name must be 100 characters or fewer
errorMessages.EmailAddressTooLong: Email address must be 256 characters or fewer
errorMessages.EmailAddressInvalidFormat: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
errorMessages.TelephoneNumberTooLong: Telephone number must be 35 characters or fewer
